title: Shades of grey
brief_description: A fictional drama which portrays an American company investigating the incidence of sexual harassment within its own organisation. In doing so, it attempts to develop a wide-reaching concept, interpretation and definition of sexual harrassment.
description: A fictional drama which portrays an American company investigating the incidence of sexual harassment within its own organisation. In doing so, it attempts to develop a wide-reaching concept, interpretation and definition of sexual harrassment.
